creator: anandavel.jeyachandran@sc.com
text:
Hi, 

our application uses the FOP.jar to convert to PDF. after the PDF is generated, we are not able to search for a particular work. but instead if we copy that particular section we are able to find that word. But the text that is copied has only junk characters(we are able to see only Squares). 

is this a problem with the code we are using?

Kindly assist. Thanks

Vel

creator: vhennebert@gmail.com
text:
Hi,

Please use the fop-users mailing list to ask questions about FOP:
http://xmlgraphics.apache.org/fop/maillist.html#fop-user

Please also provide more details about your problem: which version of FOP are you running? How do you configure fonts? What do you mean exactly by 'copy a particular section'?

Thanks,
Vincent

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resolved invalid due to lack of information (FO input file, PDF output file, etc)
